column17:
Product Description

Biotique Hair Care Hair Oil to Prevent Dandruff and Hair Loss Flame Of The Forest from the name only suggests that it is a hair loss treatment and anti dandruff hair oil which contains extracts of hibiscus and flame of forest flowers which enables healthy growth of hair. The key ingredient flame of forest is a beautifully brilliant tree that produces medicinal scarlet flower when it blooms. This is a rich oil which promotes shiney hair. It prevents dandruff and hair loss. It also fortifies follicles against damage caused to hairs due to coloring and perming. Regular use of oil leaes hair full of life and luster.Directions for Use1.Apply to hair and scalp.2. Massage well.3. Leave for 1/2 hour before washing.4. Rinse off wellIngredientsButea Frondosa Ext. (Tesu Pushpa Kwath) : 2% Hibiscus Rosa Sinensis Ext. (Japa Pushpa Kwath) : 2% Acacia Concinna Ext. (Shikakai Kwath) : 0.5% Mangifera Indica Ext. (Aam Ki Gauthali Kwath) : 0.25% Emblica Officinalis Ext. (Amal Kwath) : 1% Vegetable Oil Qty 120ml
